name: E+Europe
goal:
We are a Brussels-Â­based consultancy specializing in communications and policy support to technology companies and public authorities on European digital issues.

In 2018, we began consulting on the subject of food sustainability for the Barilla Foundation.

Since November 2018, we also run the secretariat for the Brussels office of the European Union for Progressive Judaism.
interests: Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
We follow the following issues:

Single Digital Market
Hate speech
Competition on technology issues
Privacy regulation
Copyright regulation
Platform regulation
Sustainable Development

In addition:

Food Sustainability
Common Agricultural Policy
Religious and Minority Rights.
